Name: DynamoDBAttributeDefinition
Documentation: A list of attribute definitions for the AWS::DynamoDB::Table resource. Each element is composed of an AttributeName and AttributeType.

Parameters.Name: AttributeName
Parameters.Documentation: The name of an attribute. Attribute names can be 1 – 255 characters long and have no character restrictions.

Parameters.Name: AttributeType
Parameters.Documentation: The data type for the attribute. You can specify S for string data, N for numeric data, or B for binary data.
